data.message: Hi there, my account has been hacked by someone in Iran. you guys caught it (thank you) but they changed the password prior, and now when I go to reactivate my account I am asked for my old password before making a new one. I am contacting you on my boyfriends account since I cannot get into mine.  Abey Higgins

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out to us. If you can't log into Facebook and need to reset your password, follow these steps: http://bit.ly/2nhlzvL. -Joe
